languages.text: "Рад{mf||а}, что вы осознаете, что мое пленение — ваша вина. Вы не заслужили право выслушать историю моих приключений".
"I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."
languages.original_text: "Рад{mf||а}, что вы осознаете, что мое пленение — ваша вина. Вы не заслужили право выслушать историю моих приключений".

traits.locale_text: "I am glad you realise that you bear the responsibility for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear the story of my adventures."
"I am glad you realise that you bear the responsibility for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear the story of my adventures."
"I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."
"I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."
"I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."
"I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."

languages.text: «Me alegra constatar que asumís la culpa de mi captura. No os habéis ganado el derecho a saber de mis peripecias».
languages.original_text: "I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra constatar que asumís la culpa de mi captura. No os habéis ganado el derecho a saber de mis peripecias».

languages.text: “正是因为你们的无能，我才遭到了绑架。你们能意识到这一点，我很高兴。所以，你们也没有资格听我讲述我的经历。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."

traits.locale_text: “正是因为你们的无能，我才遭到了绑架。你们能意识到这一点，我很高兴。所以，你们也没有资格听我讲述我的经历。”

languages.text: « Je me réjouis que vous réalisiez votre responsabilité dans ma capture. Cela étant, je vous refuse le droit de savoir ce qui m'est arrivé. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."

traits.locale_text: « Je me réjouis que vous réalisiez votre responsabilité dans ma capture. Cela étant, je vous refuse le droit de savoir ce qui m'est arrivé. »

languages.text: 「私が捕まったのは自分のせいだと気づいてくれて嬉しいよ。お前は私の冒険について聞く権利を持っていない」
languages.original_text: "I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."

traits.locale_text: 「私が捕まったのは自分のせいだと気づいてくれて嬉しいよ。お前は私の冒険について聞く権利を持っていない」

languages.text: "Schön, dass Ihr erkennt, dass Euch die Schuld an meiner Entführung trifft. Ihr habt Euch nicht das Recht verdient, von meinen Abenteuern zu hören."
languages.original_text: "I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."

traits.locale_text: "Schön, dass Ihr erkennt, dass Euch die Schuld an meiner Entführung trifft. Ihr habt Euch nicht das Recht verdient, von meinen Abenteuern zu hören."

languages.text: "Kaçırılmamdaki suçlunun kendin olduğunu bilmene sevindim. Maceralarımı duyma hakkına sahip değilsin."
languages.original_text: "I am glad you realise you are to blame for my capture. You have not earned the right to hear about my adventures."

traits.locale_text: "Kaçırılmamdaki suçlunun kendin olduğunu bilmene sevindim. Benim maceralarımı duyma hakkına sahip değilsin."
